name: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that RESET button works properly
id: stories/site/widgets/EventDiscoveryWidget.story;(/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that RESET button works properly

testSteps.description: Given open Event Discovery Widget page
And store all fields values on the Event Discovery Widget page
And change values for all possible fields on the Event Discovery Widget page
Then all fields have been reseted to defaults on the Event Discovery Widget page

children.description: Check that all fields have been reseted to defaults

userStory.narrative:
In order to setup Event Discovery Widget
As a user of Ticketmaster Developer Portal
I want to use the widget configurator to customize the layout of the widget,
and have ability to grab a small code snippet to insert into 3-rd party websites

title: (/products-and-docs/widgets/event-discovery/) TECHNICAL TAB - Check that RESET button works properly
